item.title: 【HD Live Performances】BOOTLEG - Madonna - The Celebration Tour In Rio (Final Bootleg - No Logo - No Glitches - With Subtitles - With Chapters)
item.description:
Hey everyone,

I’m back with my final bootleg version of the record-breaking Celebration Tour concert, live at the iconic Copacabana Beach. This version combines all video sources (Globo, Multishow and Multishow rebroadcast) and the best audio source I could find and remaster, creating a full glitch-free, logo-free bootleg with English and Portuguese subtitles and chapters. And yes, it now starts from the actual beginning, unlike my previous version.

Editing, logo removal, subtitle revision, and chapters by Felipe Hilario (@hilariofelipe1 on Twitter);
Subtitling and translation (EN and PTBR) by David Luis (@DavidLuis198 on Twitter).

The .mkv file is larger because it’s as lossless as possible compared to the sources I used. The mp4 file has a bit of quality loss, but it’s smaller and still contains chapters and subtitles. For those wondering how the logos were removed, I combined all sources to remove them by difference on Premiere, similar to a selective cropping process, but the result is not cropped. The logo on the top left-hand corner (which all sources have) was removed using AI. The remastering of the audio was done professionally on Pro Tools using top-notch mastering plugins.
Feel free to create your own DVD and Blu-ray files, audio bootlegs, or anything else you want. Hope you guys like it, enjoy!

(@DanKEdits , if you want to do an AI remaster of my version, please feel free to do so you know we adore you, right?)
